name: City ReBuild
description:
City ReBuild

City ReBuild is a (re)builder game powered with GDevelop 5 for the first GDevelop gamejam. It's a simple and small game/simulator.

Use you character to get resources and help the city to be rebuild. Talk to a NPC to know how you can help. You can explore the mini map, zoom, get rock, get wood, save your progression and make a simply quest.


The game is compatible with touch control, or keyboard & mouse. Touch the screen to activate touch control and for keyboard :

A - Action

B - Cancel

UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT - to move character

M - Menu

S - Save

Z/E - Zoom +/-

(Actually a simply level is playable due to lake of time for making more and I'm making the game alone)

Game is principaly created with open source softwares : GDevelop 5, Blender, Inkscape, Gimp.

Asset forge by Kenney has been use to produce a building base rapidely, Kay Lousberg asset (only character's face)  but all of these assests could be produce with blender.

All others assets has been made by me with Blender and Inkscape.

Music powered with Song Maker by Chrome Music Lab
